item.title: Imec spins out Vertical Compute memory chip firm in $20.5M deal
item.description: Europe's Imec.xpand is spinning out memory chip firm Vertical Compute in a seed investment round worth $20.5 million.

item.title: The U.S. unicorns most likely to go public in 2025 | NVCA/PitchBook
item.description: A raft of U.S. unicorns -- those valued at $1 billion or more -- are likely to go public in 2025, according to the PitchBook/NVCA.

item.title: Do new AI reasoning models require new approaches to prompting?
item.description: Even when it comes to non-reasoning LLMs such as Claude 3.5 Sonnet, there may be room for regular users to improve their prompting.

item.title: Mistral’s new Codestral code completion model races up third-party charts
item.description: The newest version of Mistral's code generation model Codestral aims to be more efficient and generate code twice as fast.

item.title: LlamaV-o1 is the AI model that explains its thought process—here’s why that matters
item.description: LlamaV-o1, a groundbreaking AI model from MBZUAI, revolutionizes multimodal reasoning by providing transparent step-by-step explanations across text a...
